price: Báwo ni ìrántí ṣe lè wúlò fún wọn (lásìkò ìyà)? Òjíṣẹ́ pọ́nńbélé kúkú ti dé bá wọn.
arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: annā lahumu al-dhik'rā waqad jāahum rasūlun mubīnun
